data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3538144,"name":"Eliad","username":"zie619","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/z/c89c15/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-24T16:49:24.626Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe’ve been running Kraken motors successfully, but after yesterday’s update, we encountered an issue with two of them. The encoders on these two motors are no longer reporting proper values—fluctuating between 0 and 0.03, then returning to zero. The rest of our Krakens are functioning correctly.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eNotably, these two motors are positioned in the middle of the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e chain, so we don’t believe this is an electrical issue. We’ve checked wiring continuity and connections, and everything appears intact.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eHas anyone experienced a similar issue, or does anyone have insights into potential causes? Any help would be greatly appreciated!\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-02-24T16:49:24.626Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":39,"reads":113,"readers_count":112,"score":217.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":492970,"topic_slug":"kraken-encoder-issue-after-update","display_username":"Eliad","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71930,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/kraken-encoder-issue-after-update/492970/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3538208,"name":"Dalton","username":"daltzsmith","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daltzsmith/{size}/206287_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-24T17:50:07.563Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eDo you have a plot or hoot log shows this behavior?
